滈字的基本解释

滈
hào
久雨。
〔滈滈〕水泛白光的样子。
古通“镐”，镐京，中国西周的国都（在今陕西省长安县境）：“武王以滈。”

滈
xuè
〔滈瀑〕（水）翻腾上涌的样子。

滈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hào］
［《廣韻》胡老切，上晧，匣。］
亦作“瀥1”。
(1)见“滈滈”。
(2)见“滈汗”。
(3)通“鎬”。地名。周都城。
(4)通“鎬”。古水名。在今陕西省西安市西。参阅《史记·秦始皇本纪》张守节正义引唐李泰《括地志》。
(5)通“鎬”。池名。参见“滈池”。

滈字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滈； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页642第09
【唐韻】胡老切【集韻】下老切【韻會】合老切，?音皓。【說文】久雨也。一曰水名，在鄠。【括地志】滈水，源出雍州長安縣西北滈池。　又地名。【揚雄·羽獵賦】經縈酆滈。【註】通作鎬。亦作鄗。　又滈汗，水貌。【郭璞·江賦】滈汗六州之域。　又滈滈，水白光貌。【司馬相如·上林賦】翯乎滈滈。　又【廣韻】許角切【集韻】黑角切，?音嗃。滈瀑，水沸湧貌。或作瀥?。　又【集韻】呼酷切，音熇。亦久雨也。　又黑各切，音臛。又光鑊切，音郭。義?同。

滈字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
滈字的起名意思

本义指久雨。也同“皓”，指白色。

Basic explanation of words
Depressed
hào
Long rain.
[滈滈] The water looks white.
Ancient Tong "Hao", Gao Jing, the capital of the Western Zhou Dynasty in China (in today's Chang'an County, Shaanxi Province): "The King of Wu Yihu."
Depressed
xuè
〔滈 Waterfall〕(Water) It looks like it is surging up and down.
Depressed
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hào］
["Guangyun" Hu Laoqie, Shang Hao, Xia. ]
Also known as "Yo 1".
(1) See "滈滈".
(2) See "Khan".
(3) Through the "pick". Place name. Zhouducheng.
(4) Through the "pick". Ancient water name. In the west of Xi'an, Shaanxi Province today. Refer to "Historical Records · The Book of Emperor Qin Shi Huang" Zhang Shoujie Zhengyi quoted Tang Li Tai "Kuo Di Zhi".
(5) Through the "pick". Pool name. See "滈池".
Depressed
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Character Department] 　滈; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 642 09
[Tang Yun] Hu Laoqie [Jiyun] Xia Laoqie [Yunhui] He Laoqie,? Yin Hao. [Said the text] Jiuyu also. One said the name of the water, in Hu. [Including geography] Chushui, originated from Chuchi in the northwest of Chang'an County, Yongzhou.　Also place name. 【Yang Xiong·Yu Lie Fu】The classics are lingering. [Note] It can be used as a pickaxe. Also known as Huan.　 Sweat again, water appearance. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] The territory of the six states of Chuhan.　It's bleak again, the water is white and light. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Huang almost 滈滈.　[Guangyun] Xu Jiaoqi [Jiyun] Black angle cut,? Yin 嗃. The waterfall looks like boiling water. Or do you?　[Jiyun] Hu cool and cut, sound 熇. It has been raining for a long time.　It's black and cut each other, and the sound is awkward. Then lightly cut the wok, sound Guo. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning
The original meaning refers to long rain. Also the same as "hao", referring to white.
hào
I прил.
* сверкающий; клокочущий (о воде)
II собств.
1) ист., геогр. (сокр. вм. 滴水 Хаошуй (река, приток р. 渭河)
2) ист., геогр. вм. 镐京 (Хаоцзин)
